notes.body: Our team have now identified all affected users and workspaces. We're still monitoring the situation, and we'll report back with more information in 30 minutes. Thank you for holding tight while we work on this.

We've identified the root cause of this issue, and SCIM events should now be working as expected. We are actively investigating remediation for affected customers. 

Thank you for your patience while we look into this. We'll share another update in 30 minutes.
We’re investigating an issue with SCIM deactivating users, and SCIM updates not working as expected. We’re looking into the cause and will provide more information as soon as it's available.
